quoteText:
When you access our website, www.DeepL.com, your device automatically transmits certain data for technical reasons. The following data is stored separately from any other data you may transmit to us:

  • Date and time of access
  • Browser type and version
  • Operating system
  • URL of the website visited prior to ours
  • Amount of data sent
  • Requesting domain
  • Notification of successful data retrieval
  • Search term when using a web browser
  • Shortened/anonymized IP
  • Full IP address (for a maximum of 14 days)
title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: The service collects many different types of personal data
